CodeBlockMethod.Name: ShowDiary
CodeBlockMethod.Code:
local isDateEnable = false self:ShowSOSpopup()
if self.count == 5 then self.uiDiaryButton.TextComponent.Text = "일기장 닫기" end
--if self.count > 6 then --return --end
local Content = self.Diarydata:GetCell(self.count, "Content")
if Content == nil then self.uiDiary.Enable = false return else self.uiDiary.Enable = true self.uiDiaryContent.TextComponent.Text = Content end
local Date = self.Diarydata:GetCell(self.count, "Date")
if Date ~= "" then isDateEnable = true self.uiDiaryDate.TextComponent.Text = Date end
self.uiDiaryDate.Enable = isDateEnable

CodeBlockMethod.Name: OnBeginPlay
CodeBlockMethod.Code: self.count = 1 self.uiDiaryDate = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/ui/OpenDiary/DiarySprite/DiaryDate") self.uiDiaryContent = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/ui/OpenDiary/DiarySprite/DiaryContent") self.uiDiary = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/ui/OpenDiary/DiarySprite") self.Diarydata = _DataService:GetTable("DiaryDataSet") self.uiDiaryButton = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/ui/OpenDiary/DiarySprite/DiaryButton") self.goSOSgame = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/ui/goSOSgame") self.goEscape = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/ui/ReadyEscape") self.map5 = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/maps/map05")

CodeBlockMethod.Name: ShowSOSpopup
CodeBlockMethod.Code:
if self.count == 3 then if self.goSOSgame.Enable == false then self.goSOSgame.Enable = true end end
if self.goSOSgame.Enable == true and self.uiDiaryButton.Enable then self.uiDiaryButton.Enable = false else self.uiDiaryButton.Enable = true end

CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Name: HandleButtonClickEvent
CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Code:
-- Parameters local Entity = event.Entity -------------------------------------------------------- if self.count >= 1 and self.count <= 5 then self:ShowDiary() self:UpCount() else self.uiDiary.Enable = false _UserService.LocalPlayer.MovementComponent.Enable = true if self.goEscape.Enable == false then --self.map5.SoundComponent:Stop() self.goEscape.Enable = true
wait(3) self.goEscape.Enable = false _UserService.LocalPlayer.PlayerComponent:MoveToEntityByPath("/maps/map03/object-19739") end end

CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Name: HandleButtonClickEvent2
CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Code: -- Parameters local Entity = event.Entity -------------------------------------------------------- self.count = 1 self:ShowDiary() self:UpCount()

CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Name: HandleButtonClickEvent3
CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Code: -- Parameters local Entity = event.Entity -------------------------------------------------------- self.uiDiary.Enable = false self.goSOSgame.Enable = false

CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Name: HandleButtonClickEvent4
CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Code: -- Parameters local Entity = event.Entity -------------------------------------------------------- self.uiDiary.Enable = false self.goSOSgame.Enable = false

CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Name: HandleButtonClickEvent5
CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Code: -- Parameters local Entity = event.Entity -------------------------------------------------------- if self.uiDiary.Enable == false and self.uiDiaryButton.Enable == false then self.uiDiary.Enable = true self.uiDiaryButton.Enable = true end
